# PLAYER::SET_WANTED_LEVEL_HIDDEN_ESCAPE_TIME

## Summary
Sets the time (in milliseconds) the player needs hide outside of the search area before the wanted level is removed

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **INT** wantedLevel
* **INT** timeToEscape
